summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Center Department; authorizing Concession Lease Agreements with Martha Williams, d/b/a Sundance Photo Parlor and the Gingham Bow and Flowerworks; Gaudencio M. Ponce, Sr. d/b/a Wood 'N Straw Mart; and D.J.'s Sound City, Inc. for operation of retail merchandise shops to be located on the balcony of the Center House Building (Armory Building) at the Seattle Center.
